articles.title: Neil Gaiman Knows What Happens When You Dream - The New York Times
articles.description: “Every night,” says the genre-busting author of “The Sandman,” now on Netflix, “we close our eyes, fall asleep and go mad.”
articles.content: In recent years, the word storytelling has been thoroughly absorbed by the language of commerce, reshaped into self-aggrandizing doublespeak for selling. Which only increases the countervailing need … [+21594 chars]
